Interface Context

All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<String>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContext, CachingContext, DefaultingContext, DelegatingContext, MapContext, MultiContext, ObjectContext, QueryContext, RequestTemplateContext
public interface Context
extends Serializable, Iterable<String>

Used to resolve values for template variables
